definition: powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: I dredged his fish in cornmeal and fried it over the fire.
sentences.chinese: 我在鱼上撒了玉米粉，放在篝火上烤。

sentences.english: Add Corn flour, vinegar and vanilla extract, and whisk until just combined.
sentences.chinese: 加入玉米粉，醋，和香草香精，搅拌，混合。

sentences.english: Make sure the chickens are three feet apart from each other, and make sure to feed the chickens cornmeal.
sentences.chinese: 要确定小鸡之间都间隔3英尺并且喂养它们玉米粉。

sentences.english: It's where they have the best foods, best quesadillas.
sentences.chinese: 那里的东西最好吃，有最好的油炸玉米粉饼。

sentences.english: Mix together the remaining cornflour and the icing sugar.
sentences.chinese: 将剩余的玉米粉和糖粉掺在一起。

sentences.english: I took a sack of cornmeal and carried it to the canoe.
sentences.chinese: 我拿了一袋玉米粉，带到独木舟上。

sentences.english: And the quality of the corn flour for steamed bread was preliminarily discussed.
sentences.chinese: 并对添加玉米粉做馒头的原料品质进行了初步探讨。

sentences.english: Tortillas were a new kind of food for me.
sentences.chinese: 玉米粉圆饼是给我的一种新的食品。

sentences.english: The corn will be milled into corn flour, not fed to livestock, he said.
sentences.chinese: 这些玉米都会被磨成玉米粉。

sentences.english: Blend the cornflour to a smooth paste with a little cold water.
sentences.chinese: 加入少量的凉水，将玉米粉搅拌成均匀的糊状。
这会儿我们正在吃木薯和玉米粉。

sentences.english: Tortilla wars and rising food prices in general started to raise alarm bells.
sentences.chinese: 玉米粉圆饼战争和食品价格普遍上涨开始敲响了警钟。

sentences.english: The corns had turned to powder.
sentences.chinese: 玉米粒儿已经被磨成了玉米粉。

sentences.english: The porridge given to one group contained unfortified flour.
sentences.chinese: 一个组分到的粥含有未强化的玉米粉。
